title: "Humoy" helmet mask
marks:
Inscription

at interior edge, in blue on white:
description: very small, teardrop-shaped face; small features--small slit eyes; deep vertical lines beneath eyes on each cheek; triangular incised patterns under chin; ribbed rings around neck; geometric deeply-carved hairstyle or hat, with arc on top of head and triangular patterns on sides of head; thick horizontal band of triangles behind head from ear to ear; medium to dark brown patina
